snippet: Mitt Romney will talk about income inequality, but only in certain spaces.
abstract: Mitt Romney will talk about income inequality, but only in certain spaces.
lead_paragraph: I guess Mitt Romney, who managed to win the first two Republican presidential nominating contests despite saying some pretty strange things, must think he's onto a good thing. So he's saying more bizarre things.

headline.main: Quiet Rooms? Like the Quiet Car on the Acela?
